metadata.title: CVE-2021-35042 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Django 3.1.x before 3.1.13 and 3.2.x before 3.2.5 allows QuerySet.order_bySQL injection if order_by is untrusted input from a client of a webapplication.

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
